sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { View, Text, StyleSheet, StatusBar, Image, ScrollView, TouchableOpacity } from 'react-native';
import { useTheme } from '@react-navigation/native';
import Icon from 'react-native-vector-icons/dist/FontAwesome'
import { Button } from 'galio-framework';

const DetailScreen = ({navigation}) => {

  const { colors } = useTheme();

  const theme = useTheme();
  
    return (
        <View style={styles.container}>

        <View style={styles.topTab}>
        <View style={styles.row}>
          <TouchableOpacity onPress={()=>{
            navigation.goBack()
            }}>
            <Icon name="chevron-left" color={"#FFF"} size={20} style={styles.optionTab}/>
          </TouchableOpacity>
          <View style={styles.viewSearch}>
            <TouchableOpacity>
              <Icon name="search" color={"#FFF"} size={22} style={styles.optionTab}/>
            </TouchableOpacity>
          </View>  
        </View>
        </View>

        <ScrollView>

            <View style={styles.container}>
                <StatusBar barStyle= { theme.dark ? "light-content" : "dark-content" }/>
                {/* <Text style={{color: colors.text}}>Detail Screen</Text>
                <Button
                    title="กลับไปหน้าหลัก"
                    onPress={() => navigation.goBack()}
                /> */}
                <View style={styles.viewName}>
                    <Image source={require('../assets/images/imageProfile.png')}
                    style={{width: 85, height: 85}} />
                    <View style={styles.profile}>
                        <Text style={styles.textUsername}>PIMTHA</Text>
                        <Text style={styles.textFullname}>Pimnapa Sirikul</Text>
                        <Text>
                            <Icon name='phone' size={15} color='black'/>
                            {' '}083-824-8713
                        </Text>
                        <Text>
                            <Icon name='envelope-square' size={15} color='blue'/>
                            {' '}ส่งข้อความ
                        </Text>
                    </View>
                </View>

                    <View style={styles.ViewDesc}>
                        <View style={styles.blockDesc}>
                            <Icon name='map-marker'size={35} color='#c62828'/>
                            <View style={styles.nextToColumn}>
                                <Text style={styles.greySmall}>จุดเริ่มต้น</Text>
                                <Text>กรุงเทพมหานคร</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.blockDesc}>
                            <Text style={styles.textGoTo}>ไปยัง</Text>
                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.blockDesc}>
                            <Icon name='map-pin' size={35} color='#c62828'/>
                            <View style={styles.nextToColumn}>
                                <Text style={styles.greySmall}>ปลายทาง</Text>
                                <Text>เชียงใหม่</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                    <Image source={require('../assets/images/map.jpg')}
                        style={{height: 200 , width: "100%"}} />
                    <View style={styles.viewRow}>
                        <Icon name='clock-o' size={35} color='green'/>
                        <View style={styles.nextToColumn}>
                            <Text style={styles.greySmall}>วันที่-เวลา</Text>
                            <Text>วันพุธ 10 มิ.ย. เวลา 16.30</Text>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.viewRow}>
                        <View style={styles.blockTwoColumn}>
                            <Icon name='street-view' size={35} color='black'/>
                            <View style={styles.nextToColumn}>
                                <Text style={styles.greySmall}>จำนวนที่นั่ง</Text>
                                <Text>4 ที่นั่ง</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.blockTwoColumn}>
                            <Icon name='btc' size={35} color='#fdd835'/>
                            <View style={styles.nextToColumn}>
                                <Text style={styles.greySmall}>ราคาต่อที่นั่ง</Text>
                                <Text>300 ฿</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.viewRow}>
                        <View style={styles.blockTwoColumn}>
                            <Icon name='car' size={35} color='#ef5350'/>
                            <View style={styles.nextToColumn}>
                                <Text style={styles.greySmall}>ยี่ห้อรถ</Text>
                                <Text>TOYOTA</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.blockTwoColumn}>
                            <Icon name='car' size={35} color='#ef5350'/>
                            <View style={styles.nextToColumn}>
                                <Text style={styles.greySmall}>รุ่น</Text>
                                <Text>Altis</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.viewRow}>
                        <View style={styles.blockTwoColumn}>
                            <Icon name='address-card-o' size={35} color='black'/>
                            <View style={styles.nextToColumn}>
                                <Text style={styles.greySmall}>ทะเบียนรถ</Text>
                                <Text>xx xxxx</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.blockTwoColumn}>
                            <Icon name="paint-brush" size={35} color='#ffab91'/>
                            <View style={styles.nextToColumn}>
                                <Text style={styles.greySmall}>สีรถ</Text>
                                <Text>ขาว</Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                    <Button round uppercase color="#0097a7"
                            onPress={()=>{
                            navigation.navigate('หน้าแรก')
                    }}>ร่วมเดินทาง</Button>
            </View>
        </ScrollView>

        </View>

    );
};

export default DetailScreen;

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  container: {
    flex: 1, 
    alignItems: 'center', 
    justifyContent: 'center',
  },
  viewName: {
    flexDirection:'row',
    // alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start', 
    // flex: 1,
    paddingTop:10,
    paddingBottom:10,
    paddingLeft: 20,
    borderBottomWidth: 2,
    borderBottomColor:'#616161',
    width:'100%',
},
profile: {
  marginLeft:20,
},
textUsername: {
    fontSize: 20,
},
textFullname: {
    fontSize: 15,
},
ViewDesc: {
    flexDirection:'row',
    marginBottom: 10,
},
blockDesc: {
    marginLeft: 10,
    marginTop: 10,
    flexDirection:'row',
    width:"30%",
},
nextToColumn: {
    flexDirection: 'column',
    marginLeft: 10
},
greySmall: {
    fontSize:13,
    color:"#616161"
},
textGoTo: {
    marginTop:10,
    left: 43,
    fontSize: 13,
    color:"#616161"
},
viewRow: {
    flexDirection:'row',
    paddingTop: 10,
    width: "100%",
    paddingLeft: 20,
    borderBottomWidth: 2,
    borderBottomColor:'#616161',
    paddingBottom: 10,
},
blockTwoColumn: {
    flexDirection:'row',
    width:"50%",
},
  //top tab
topTab: {
    width: '100%',
    color: "#FFF",
    backgroundColor: '#28288C',
},
optionTab: {
    paddingBottom: 17,
    paddingTop: 17,
    color: "#FFF",
    paddingLeft: 10,
},
viewSearch: {
    alignItems: 'flex-end',
    width: "88%",
    // borderColor: "white",
    // borderWidth: 4,
},
row: {
    flexDirection: "row",
}
});
